statements: SELECT * FROM therapy_session_notes
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, session_date FROM therapy_session_notes WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT session_date, therapist_id FROM therapy_session_notes WHERE therapist_id = 2 ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT session_notes FROM therapy_session_notes WHERE session_id = 3
SELECT * FROM therapy_session_notes ORDER BY session_date ASC
SELECT * FROM therapy_session_notes WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, session_date FROM therapy_session_notes WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(session_id) AS num_sessions FROM therapy_session_notes GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_sessions > 5;
SELECT therapist_id, AVG(therapist_id) AS avg_therapist_id FROM therapy_session_notes GROUP BY therapist_id;
SELECT * FROM therapy_session_notes WHERE session_notes LIKE '%progress%' AND session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, date, notes FROM therapy_sessions WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT therapist_id, name, department FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapist_id FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT therapist_id, name FROM therapists ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 3 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM therapy_sessions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING session_count > 3

SELECT therapist_id, department, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM therapists LEFT JOIN therapy_sessions ON therapists.therapist_id = therapy_sessions.therapist_id GROUP BY therapist_id ORDER BY session_count DESC
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, date FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT notes FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, date FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization, experience_years FROM therapists ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender='F';

SELECT therapy_sessions.date, therapists.therapist_name, patients.patient_name FROM therapy_sessions JOIN therapists ON therapy_sessions.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id JOIN patients ON therapy_sessions.patient_id = patients.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, therapist_name, date, notes FROM therapy_sessions JOIN patients ON therapy_sessions.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN therapists ON therapy_sessions.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-10-10';
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, session_date FROM sessions WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_id, session_notes FROM sessions WHERE therapist_id = '65432101-98ab-47dc-8261-e9244ecaa322';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id FROM sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM sessions;
SELECT session_id, session_date FROM sessions WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(session_id) AS num_sessions FROM sessions GROUP BY therapist_id ORDER BY num_sessions DESC;
SELECT patient_id, session_date, session_notes FROM sessions WHERE patient_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' AND session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapist_id, session_date FROM sessions WHERE session_date <= '2022-05-31' ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM TherapySessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage='50mg';
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, feedback_rating FROM SessionFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, t.name AS therapist_name, s.session_date FROM TherapySessions s JOIN Patients p ON s.patient_id = p.id JOIN Therapists t ON s.therapist_id = t.id WHERE s.session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT m.name, m.dosage, s.session_notes FROM Medications m JOIN TherapySessions s ON m.id = s.patient_id WHERE s.therapist_id = 101;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, t.specialization, f.feedback_rating FROM Patients p JOIN Therapists t ON p.id = t.id JOIN SessionFeedback f ON p.id = f.patient_id WHERE f.feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY f.feedback_rating DESC;
